scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.buildDev: cd client && npm run buildDev && cd ../
scripts.buildDevDocker: cd client && npm run buildDevDocker && cd ../
scripts.buildWatch: cd client && npm run start-client && cd ../
scripts.dockerBuildWebLocal: npm run buildDevDocker && docker-compose build web && docker-compose up -d web && npm run buildDev
scripts.origin: npm run build && scp -i "~/.ssh/mine2.pem" .env.production  ec2-user@ec2-54-172-80-40.compute-1.amazonaws.com:/home/ec2-user/app/.env && rsync --include .git --exclude-from="$(git -C . ls-files --exclude-standard -oi --directory >.git/ignores.tmp && echo .git/ignores.tmp)" -rave "ssh -i ~/.ssh/mine2.pem" . ec2-user@ec2-54-172-80-40.compute-1.amazonaws.com:/home/ec2-user/app && npm run buildDev
scripts.copyToServer: npm run build && scp -i "~/.ssh/mine.pem" .env ec2-user@ec2-35-166-43-127.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:/home/ec2-user/app/.env && scp -i "~/.ssh/mine.pem" .env ec2-user@ec2-35-166-43-127.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:/home/ec2-user/app/dummydata/.env && rsync --include .git --exclude-from="$(git -C . ls-files --exclude-standard -oi --directory >.git/ignores.tmp && echo .git/ignores.tmp)" -rave "ssh -i ~/.ssh/mine.pem" . ec2-user@ec2-35-166-43-127.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:/home/ec2-user/app && npm run buildDev
scripts.deployWeb: npm run copyToServer && ssh -i "~/.ssh/mine.pem" ec2-user@ec2-35-166-43-127.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com 'cd /home/ec2-user/app && docker-compose build web && docker-compose up -d web && docker-compose logs --tail 500 --follow web'
scripts.deployInit: npm run copyToServer && ssh -i "~/.ssh/mine.pem" ec2-user@ec2-35-166-43-127.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com 'cd /home/ec2-user/app  && docker-compose build && docker-compose up -d && docker-compose logs --tail 500 --follow'
scripts.restartRemoteDB: ssh -i "~/.ssh/mine.pem" ec2-user@ec2-35-166-43-127.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com 'cd /home/ec2-user/app  && docker-compose restart cassandra && docker-compose logs --tail 500  --follow cassandra'
scripts.dockerRemoteDBCompactionStats: ssh -i "~/.ssh/mine.pem" ec2-user@ec2-35-166-43-127.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com 'cd /home/ec2-user/app  && docker-compose exec -it cassandra bash nodetool compactionstats'
